content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements looking for a creative way to keep your car smelling fresh while adding a touch of handmade charm crochet vent clip air fresheners are the perfect solution these adorable and functional accessories are not only great for adding style to your car but also for diffusing your favorite essential oils or fragrances as you drive this pumpkin pouch works up in less than 30 minutes and uses only 21 yards of yarn they re perfect for craft fairs and gifts crochet pumpkin air freshener is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity & love crafts all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2024 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/pumpkin-crochet-vent-clip-air-freshener/
